content: an ode to the sea the salt chuck socks are simple yet spruced-up basic cuff-down socks with a twist these socks feature - twisted rib cuff - 3x1 ribbing - jogless striping - contrast heels toe & cuff - shadow wrap heel short row - stockinette - wedge toe - kitchener stitch toe closure *note* this pattern has not been test-knit i would love and appreciate if you share your feedback with me
